body_html:
Back to the pytorch install from sources, I ran python setup.py install with VERBOSE=ON, and the first command that fails is

/usr/bin/c++ -DWITH_MPI=1 -D_THD_CORE=1 -I/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/THD -I/usr/lib64/mpi/gcc/mvapich2/include -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 -fexceptions -std=c++11 -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC -fmessage-length=0;-funwind-tables;-fasynchronous-unwind-tables -o CMakeFiles/THD.dir/base/ChannelUtils.cpp.o -c /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/THD/base/ChannelUtils.cpp

Turns out that the following files do NOT exist at the time of running this command:

  • /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC
  • /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS
  • /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS
  • /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN

For the record, here is the content of my pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install directory after the fail:
find-on-tmp_install.txt

/usr/bin/c++  -DWITH_MPI=1 -D_THD_CORE=1 -I/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/THD -I/usr/lib64/mpi/gcc/mvapich2/include  -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 -fexceptions  -std=c++11 -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC   -fmessage-length=0;-funwind-tables;-fasynchronous-unwind-tables -o CMakeFiles/THD.dir/base/ChannelUtils.cpp.o -c /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/THD/base/ChannelUtils.cpp
Turns out that the following files do NOT exist at the time of running this command:

/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC

For the record, here is the content of my pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install directory after the fail:
find-on-tmp_install.txt
body:
Back to the pytorch install from sources, I ran `python setup.py install` with VERBOSE=ON, and the first command that fails is

 `/usr/bin/c++  -DWITH_MPI=1 -D_THD_CORE=1 -I/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/THD -I/usr/lib64/mpi/gcc/mvapich2/include  -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 -fexceptions  -std=c++11 -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC   -fmessage-length=0;-funwind-tables;-fasynchronous-unwind-tables -o CMakeFiles/THD.dir/base/ChannelUtils.cpp.o -c /home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/THD/base/ChannelUtils.cpp`

Turns out that the following files do NOT exist at the time of running this command:

- `/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC`
- `/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS`
- `/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS`
- `/home/tannier/tools/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN`

For the record, here is the content of my `pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install` directory after the fail:
[find-on-tmp_install.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/2196760/find-on-tmp_install.txt)
